node.title: Mystery surrounds the death of missing campers. Could police be close to finding the answers?
node.alt: A composite image of a man outside and a woman holding a glass of wine at a restaurant
node.description: It's been a long 18 months for the family ofÂ Russell Hill and Carol Clay as they wait to find out exactly what happened out in the remote high country where they disappeared.
node.content:
["It is the case that has held Australia in suspense for more than 18 months and left two families waiting and waiting for answers.", "So when police on Tuesday announced a man had been arrested in relation to the disappearances of Russell Hill and Carol Clay, it was always going to be big news.", "But few could guess the details that would emerge later from one of the country's major airlines.", "Jetstar confirmed it had stood down one of its employees in connection to the disappearances.", "\"As a matter of course, the employee has been removed from duty as a result of their arrest.\"", "It was a dramatic day that followed a long investigation.", "Police first became involved back in March last year, after Mr Hill and Ms Clay set off for a camping trip in the Wonnangatta Valley in East Gippsland.", "It is about as remote a spot as you can find to camp.", "", "
The pair's campsite was found burnt, but Mr Hill's car was still there.(Supplied)
", "In the valley, you are a long way from help if you get in\u00a0trouble.", "There are just three very rough four-wheel-drive tracks in and out, there is no phone reception, and the closest town is hours away.", "Russell Hill was a bushman, a former contract logger who helped to build one of the main tracks into the valley.", "He knew this part of the world better than most.", "But two days after he left for the Wonnangatta Valley, his camp site was found burnt out.", "His car was there, but a drone was missing, along with the couple.", "Mr Hill and Ms Clay have not been seen since.", "", "
Both the site of the arrest and the camp site the pair disappeared from are in a remote part of Gippsland.\u00a0(ABC News)
", "
Investigation heats up as police make arrest
", "For police, this has turned into one of the country's most high-profile missing person cases.", "Robbie Ashlin was mates with Mr Hill.\u00a0They were part of an amateur radio club together.", "\"It has been a long haul,\" he said of the past 18 months.", "Without answers, the disappearances have been difficult for him to understand.", "", "
Police seized this 4WD belonging to the 55-year-old man they arrested.(ABC News: Daniel Fermer)
", "The public interest in the baffling disappearances has also been intense, and media across the country have followed every step of the investigation \u2014 an investigation that clearly heated up in the last couple of weeks before police on Tuesday arrested a 55-year-old Caroline Springs man that we now know worked for Jetstar.", "We know that arrest occurred at a campground near Moroka Road at Arbuckle Junction.", "It is a small dot on the map, south of the Wonnangatta Valley and north of Licola.", "The man's Nissan Patrol was seized by police, which included members of the force's special operations group.", "No charges have been laid.", "", "
The remote location of the Wonnangatta Valley has made the search even more difficult.(ABC News: Tim Bates)
", "
Remote area makes any progress difficult
", "The police officer who has led the long and arduous investigation into the disappearances for the past 18 months has been Detective Inspector Andrew Stamper.", "His team has faced plenty of challenges.", "Initially, the location of the Wonnangatta Valley proved difficult \u2014 it is a long drive into the valley, and the bush there is vast and dense.", "Some of the undergrowth is impenetrable on foot, and supplies are a long way off.", "", "
Police have combed through remote bushland to search for\u00a0the missing couple.(ABC News: Tim\u00a0Bates)
", "In July last year, he spoke to the ABC after initial searches had failed to find the pair.", "Since then, police have spent more than a year piecing together who was where at the time Mr Hill and Ms Clay disappeared.", "They have used CCTV cameras as well as interviews with campers to identify all the cars that were in the valley at the time and track down the owners one by one.", "Early this month, police went public with a photo of a four-wheel drive.\u00a0It was in the valley last March, but officers had not been able to identify the driver.", "It was a blue Nissan Patrol, seen towing a trailer in the valley late on the night that Mr Hill and Ms Clay disappeared.", "Inspector Stamper told the media at the time that police did not know if it was connected to the disappearance.", "\"Detectives have also been given information that a vehicle attempted to leave the valley late at night on the evening of Friday, March 20, but the Myrtleford gate was closed because of the bushfires, meaning that the driver had to make a complicated turn back in the direction from which they had come.\"", "
Hope for answers as families stay away
", "The vehicle was also seen on two cameras at the top of Mount Hotham, where police believe a driver would exit the valley if the Myrtleford gate was closed.", "", "
Mountain cattleman Charlie Lovick says the disappearance has scared a lot of families in the area.(Supplied: Emily McCormack)
", "At this stage, police have not confirmed if that is the vehicle they have now seized.", "For the residents of the sparsely populated high country, any development in this case has been welcomed.", "Charlie Lovick, a well-known cattleman in the area, said the disappearances had been deeply felt.", "\"The reality is, and quite rightly, it scared a lot of people out of the bush,\" he said.", "Like many, he hopes this is a case that will be solved.", "But for now, family\u00a0and friends of Russell Hill and Carol Clay and those in the high country are again waiting for more information and waiting for answers."]
